SectionBody.Text: There is established a statewide criminal analysis laboratory system to be composed of:

Subsection.Text: The state-operated laboratories under the jurisdiction of the Department of Law Enforcement in Ft. Myers, Jacksonville, Pensacola, Orlando, Tallahassee, Tampa, and such other areas of the state as may be necessary;
The existing locally funded laboratories in Broward, Indian River, Miami-Dade, Palm Beach, and Pinellas Counties, specifically designated in s. 943.35 to be eligible for state matching funds; and
Such other laboratories as render criminal analysis laboratory services to criminal justice agencies in the state.
